New Records: Suryakumar Yadav became the first Indian to cross 1000-run mark in a calendar year in the India vs Zimbabwe T20 World Cup match.
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 61 runs off 25 deliveries including six boundaries and four sixes at a strike-rate of 244.00 in the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav's highest score in T20Is is 117 with an average of 44.60 including a century and nine half-centuries.
